nodes.text: Dark Vengeance: The True Story of Darth Maul and His Revenge Against the Jedi Known as Obi-Wan Kenobi

"Dark Vengeance: The True Story of Darth Maul and His Revenge Against the Jedi Known as Obi-Wan Kenobi" is a short story that was published in the anthology The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark, adapting the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episodes "Brothers" and "Revenge". It was written by Rebecca Roanhorse, and published on August 25, 2020 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.
